text: Good question about core DLC support. As of now I think that’s TBD. I think as of now we plan to stay active and relevant in Stacks and the DLC community, and we’re proud to be a leader there. So we hope that we can continue to keep the community versions of everything up to date and supported, even if we aren’t necessarily using it in our primary product.

elements.text: Good question about core DLC support. As of now I think that’s TBD.
